Line 1: Line 1:   +
{{non-free}}
The '''Weasley family''' are a [[fictional]] family of [[Wizarding world|wizards]] who figure prominently in the plot of [[J. K. Rowling]]'s ''[[Harry Potter]]'' series of novels. This is primarily because the youngest son, [[Ron Weasley]], is the best friend of the series' [[protagonist]], [[Harry Potter (character)|Harry Potter]].
The '''Weasley family''' are a [[fictional]] family of [[Wizarding world|wizards]] who figure prominently in the plot of [[J. K. Rowling]]'s ''[[Harry Potter]]'' series of novels. This is primarily because the youngest son, [[Ron Weasley]], is the best friend of the series' [[protagonist]], [[Harry Potter (character)|Harry Potter]].
